about_the_game:
They just want to bring dreams to people all over the world...
However, there were sad Santa Clauses who were somehow arrested when the police found them.

▼Game Features

Today is the long-awaited Christmas. You are Santa Claus and deliver Christmas gifts to people all over the world. However, if you are found by the police patrolling the streets, they will chase you and arrest you. You have to find the Christmas tree and put the gifts under it while hiding from the police.

▼Simple and Varied Action

Santa Clauses can perform simple and varied actions such as climbing the walls of the house or gliding from the sky with balloons. Use them to your advantage and distribute the gifts without being detected by the police.

▼Listen Carefully For the Sound Of the Bell!

You look for Christmas trees placed on the map and place Christmas gifts there. If a Christmas tree is nearby, you will hear the sound of bells. Try to find the Christmas trees by relying on the sound of the bell.

▼Bonus Unlock System

Various bonuses are unlocked based on the number of gifts delivered to people around the world and the number of bells placed in the city. Bonuses include increasing Santa's stamina level, releasing new maps, unlocking hidden characters, and more!

▼About Video Distribution

・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.
・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

▼ For those who play with keyboard and mouse

The camera's default settings are set for the gamepad.
If you play with a keyboard and mouse, we recommend that you make the following settings before game play.
・Lower the camera speed.
・Check the camera invert Y setting.
